title: What is ChatGPT and How You Can Use It
excerpt: What is ChatGPT, and will it change everything? How Chat GPT is AI future... (and I think it's smarter than me). In this video I'll cover exactly how the chatbot created by OpenAI is changing all industries, not just that of development and programming, and how chat gpt will be even making google redundant.
